remarks: An equivalent condition for being a limit.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ellimcabssub0.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
ellimcabssub0.g $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) $.
ellimcabssub0.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
ellimcabssub0.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
ellimcabssub0.p $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
ellimcabssub0.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
ellimcabssub0 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( F limCC D ) <-> 0 e. ( G limCC D ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
